text: Iwe Dawood (Dhavhidha)! Zvirokwazvo, takakuita mumiririri panyika, naizvozvo tonga vanhu nechokwadi, uye usave unotevedzera chido chako nekuti chichakurasisa kubva munzira yaAllah. Zvirokwazvo, avo vanorasika kubva munzira yaAllah, vachave nemutongo wakaomarara nekuti vakakanganwa zuva rekutongwa
